articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: McLaren repaired old floors to fix Norris's car “destroyed” in Verstappen crash - Motorsport.com
articles.description: McLaren Formula 1 team turned to a stockpile of previously damaged car parts to repair the areas of Norris’s machine that were broken in his Austrian GP crash with Verstappen
articles.content: McLaren has fixed the Formula 1 car Lando Norris claimed was destroyed in his Austrian Grand Prix crash with Max Verstappen by fitting it with repaired old floors which had been damaged earlier in 20… [+2533 chars]
